message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $140.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above $140. How about we meet at $130? I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to make a serious offer. However, I'm still looking to get a good price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $135, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit off. How about we meet at $132? I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to be within my limit.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $136. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $132 and $136, so I'll offer you $134.
I appreciate the middle ground, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to go up to $133, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand that you're making a serious offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $135. I'm willing to meet you at $134.5, which is the closest I can get to your offer.

I'm not willing to go above $133, and I don't think I can go any lower. I'm going to have to consider buying from John for $150, but I'll make one last offer of $133. If you can meet me at that price, I'll buy the product from you. If not, I'll have to walk away.
